articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Comoros President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Comoros President 
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Ahmed Abdallah Mohamed Sambi, President of the Comoros, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the Comoros continuous development and prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the Comoros would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Malawi President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Malawi President
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme Peopleâ€™s Assembly, on July 2 sent a message of greetings to Bingu Wa Mutharika, President of Malawi, on the 46th anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Malawi would steadily develop and sincerely wished the President and the people of Malawi greater success in the work for the socio-economic development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Venezuelan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Venezuelan President 
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Hugo Chavez Frias, President of Venezuela, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries maintaining the independent stand against imperialism would grow stronger in various fields and wished the President and the people of Venezuela greater success in the work for building a society in which the idea of the Bolivarian revolution is embodied.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Venezuelan FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Venezuelan FM
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Monday sent a message of greetings to his Venezuelan counterpart Nicolas Maduro Moros on the independence day of the country. 
					 Pak in the message wished the foreign minister of Venezuela great success in his work for defending the Bolivarian Socialist Revolution and the international prestige of the country from foreign forces' moves for aggression, and expressed belief that the ties of solidarity between the foreign ministries of the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Rev. Han Sang Ryol Visits Various Places
articles.content:
Rev. Han Sang Ryol Visits Various Places
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification champion of south Korea, visited King Tongmyong's Mausoleum on Monday.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the mausoleum, the tomb of founder-king of Koguryo, is well preserved and managed after being reconstructed as a historic treasure of the nation, he looked round the monument to the reconstruction of the mausoleum, the mausoleum, stone statues, Jongrung Temple and others.  
					
					 He also visited the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace.
					
					 He was impressed to see schoolchildren bringing their hopes and talents into full bloom in the splendidly built palace.
					
					 He also visited the Three-Revolution Exhibition, Moranbong Secondary School No. 1 and other places. And he enjoyed an acrobatic performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Red Cross Society of China headed by Vice-President Hao Linna arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Performance of Russian Dance Company Goes On
articles.content:
Performance of Russian Dance Company Goes On
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia gave a performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on July 4.
					 Appreciating the performance were servicepersons.
					
					 The dance company put on the stage colorful numbers it prepared with sincerity, carrying with its profound reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In Russian dance "Summer", Azerbaijan dance "Herd Boys", Ukrainian dance "Gopak-Kolo" and other dance pieces, the Russian artistes truthfully represented the emotion and customs of different nations with merry and dynamic music and skilful and graceful rhythms.

articles.title: KRA, Bedrock of Standing Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
KRA, Bedrock of Standing Revolutionary Armed Forces
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are greeting the anniversary of the Korean Revolutionary Army (KRA).
					 President Kim Il Sung formed the KRA in Guyushu, Yitong County on July 6, Juche 19 (1930).
					
					 That day he, in his speech "On the Mission and Basic Tasks of the Korean Revolutionary Army", said the KRA should conduct brisk political and military activities to train core elements, secure weapons, accumulate military experience and closely rally broad sections of people for an organized anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 At that time the revolutionaries of a new generation lacked knowledge, military manual and experience necessary to launch an anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 There were only some people from the Independence Army and Hwasong Uisuk School and some pistols. They had to gain both weapons and military experience by themselves.   
					
					 Under such conditions, it was imperative for the founding of standing revolutionary armed forces and full-scale armed struggle to train core elements of the revolution, secure weapons, gain military experience and lay mass foundations by dint of a transitional armed organization. 
					
					 That is why he formed the KRA before the founding of standing revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 After nearly two years of preparations, he founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army, standing revolutionary armed forces, on April 25, Juche 21 (1932).
					
					 The KRA served as bedrock of the strong revolutionary armed forces of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: KCNA Refutes US Accusation against DPRK over "Human Rights Issue"
articles.content:
KCNA Refutes US Accusation against DPRK over "Human Rights Issue"
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the U.S. State Department recently asserted that "human rights issue" in the DPRK would be a top-priority concern of the U.S. as it would adversely affect a process for mending the relations with the DPRK.
					 In a word this means the DPRK-U.S. relations may improve should the DPRK meet the U.S. demand over the "human rights issue". 
					
					 This is a challenge and mockery of the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK. 
					
					 Lurking behind these utterances is a foolish aim to bring its "human rights offensive" against the DPRK to success with improved relations as a bargaining chip. 
					
					 As shown by history, the U.S. has always used "human rights issue" as a means for interfering and pressurizing other countries in its foreign policy.
					
					 The U.S. talk that the "human rights issue" in the DPRK is its top- priority concern only betrays its scenario for aggression to intensify the interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK and pressure upon it to an extreme pitch. 
					
					 The DPRK will never allow even the slightest attempt of the U.S. to bring down the inviolable socialist system in the DPRK under the pretext of "human rights issue".
					
					 By origin, the U.S. has no face to talk about the "human rights issue" in the DPRK as it is the worst human rights abuser which has systematically violated the rights of the Korean people in the most inhuman manner. 
					
					 Such "human rights issue" as what the U.S. touted much does not exist in the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. has wantonly infringed upon the Korean people's rights to live and exist through its undisguised armed intervention, genocide and persistent and harsh sanctions and blockade, considering the DPRK's dignified socialist system as a thorn in its flesh century after century.
					
					 The U.S. had better roll back its policy of aggression toward the DPRK at once and improve, above all, its worst human rights record in the world if it is truly interested in human rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Group of Traitors' Projected PSI Drills Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Group of Traitors' Projected PSI Drills Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers recently announced that they would stage PSI-related maritime intercepting and inspecting drills at Pusan Port and in waters around it in October and are now busy stepping up the preparations for them. Meanwhile, the puppet Human Rights Committee "recommended" the authorities to resume the "psychological warfare against the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a deliberate and premeditated provocative move to spark off a military conflict between the north and the south and, on this basis, ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The above-said committee "recommended" the authorities to resume the "psychological warfare against the north" with lies, mud-slinging and sophism. This is an unpardonable insult to the system and dignity of the DPRK and another grave provocation to it.
					
					 The above-mentioned warfare is aimed at malignantly slandering the dignified socialist system in the DPRK which its people value as their life and soul and whitewashing the reality of the corrupt society of south Korea. Through the despicable false propaganda the group of traitors seeks to do harm to the single-minded unity and mental power of the army and people of the DPRK in a bid to attain their ambition for invading it with ease.
					
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the case of sunk warship faked up by the group of traitors is so tense that a war may break out any moment. The Lee Myung Bak group is unhesitatingly seeking to stage the above-said drills and resume the said warfare against this backdrop. These are reckless actions which can be taken only by those who are keen to unleash a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean People's Army will take merciless and decisive retaliatory measures against the puppet group's full participation in PSI and projected resumption of the "psychological warfare against the north" as it had already warned. The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing disastrous consequences, warns the commentary.

articles.title: DPRK's Efforts to Bolster up Its Nuclear Deterrent
articles.content:
DPRK's Efforts to Bolster up Its Nuclear Deterrent
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The recently declassified U.S. state documents revealed the fact that it planned a nuclear attack on the DPRK in 1969 when the EC-121 large spy plane incident occurred.
					This proves that the U.S. imperialists have steadily renewed and developed their scenario for a nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the U.S. imperialists have so far worked hard to realize their variety of scenarios for igniting a new war in Korea, it says:
					
					 The historical facts and the present reality testify to the fact that the DPRK was entirely right when it came to the conclusion that it was the only way to cope with nukes in kind.
					
					 It was the exercise of the DPRK's legitimate right to self-defence that it had access to nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. increasing nuclear threat.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrence was required by the prevailing situation in which the danger of a nuclear war to be provoked by the U.S. on the Korean Peninsula is becoming real and a step taken by it to firmly defend its sovereignty and Korean-style socialist system.
					
					 No one can guess when the DPRK will come under the nuclear attack of the U.S. imperialists as these trigger-happy forces are further stepping up their moves to stifle the DPRK than ever before  over the "Cheonan" case. That is why the DPRK has paid a special attention to bolstering up its nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The serious situation prevailing on the peninsula requires the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent in a new developed manner.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Achieve Great National Unity
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Achieve Great National Unity
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The north-south relations have been brought to a total collapse and dark clouds of a war are hanging heavily over Korea every hour due to the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy towards the DPRK and the frantic moves stepped up by the south Korean puppet group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, taking advantage of it. In order to cope with this grave situation all the Koreans should unite close under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 No one has the right to breach the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and any behavior in violation of them precisely means a criminal act of violating the north-south agreements and going against the public opinion at home and abroad, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is driving the inter-Korean relations to such all-out confrontation and war phase as that of the former military dictatorial regime. The group of traitors referred to the UN the warship case, a hideous farce orchestrated by it in a bid to increase the sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK. It is, at the same time, busy staging anti-DPRK confrontation burlesques on the occasion of June 25, the day the Korean War was kicked off, to more frantically stoke bitterness towards fellow countrymen than ever before.
					
					 Without frustrating the group's reckless moves to escalate the confrontation it is not possible to protect the historic inter-Korean declarations and precious achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification nor is it possible to expect any progress in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The will of the Koreans for independent reunification will remain unbreakable and final victory is in store for them struggling in unity full of confidence no matter what manifold trials may lie in the way of the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out in a just nationwide patriotic struggle for courageously meeting the challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity, concludes the article.

articles.title: Shameful Deed of Lee Myung Bak Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Shameful Deed of Lee Myung Bak Condemned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kang Ki Gap, representative of the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea, at the general meeting of lawmakers from the party on June 28 condemned the pro-U.S. sycophantic deed of traitor Lee Myung Bak, who extended the "transfer of wartime operation control (OPCON)".
					 Recalling that Lee behaved like a hangdog, repeatedly expressing "thanks" to the U.S. chief executive when agreeing on the extension of the OPCON, Kang charged that nothing would be more shameful than this behavior.
					
					 What is more amazing is that Lee is set to hold negotiations for the conclusion of the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S. in return for its approval of the extension of the OPCON, he said, contending that any people would never pardon their "government" bartering the sovereignty lock, stock and barrel to outsiders .
					
					 He warned that the people will never pardon the dictatorial regime which seeks only its own luxury, not knowing into whose hands it is playing.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves of US-S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves of US-S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, sent protest letters to the U.S. embassy and the south Korean puppet embassy in Vienna on June 28 as regards the lapse of six decades since the outbreak of the Korean War.
					 He in the letters condemned the U.S. imperialists and their followers for having ignited the Korean War 60 years ago and committed brutal atrocities beyond human imagination even by using chemical weapons. Repetition of such acts should never be allowed, he urged.
					
					 He demanded that the south Korean authorities stop at once the moves for aggression against the DPRK and honestly implement the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, ensure the right to the activities of the trade unions in south Korea and release the detained union members without delay.
					
					 The U.S. should not link with the DPRK the case of sinking of "Cheonan", warship of the south Korean puppet navy, aimed at bolstering its military presence and domination over south Korea, he stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Commemorated in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea issued bulletin titled "Great Man for the Century" on June 26 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, is the eternal sun of the Korean people and the world progressives, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 It has been 16 years since his demise but he is still remembered as a great man for the century by the world people.
					
					 He is an outstanding great man who founded the guiding idea in the era of independence and clearly indicated the road to be followed by humankind. 
					
					 He is also the peerlessly elder statesman as he made undying contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence with his extraordinary leadership. 
					
					 He is the peerlessly great man who attracted all people with his noblest personality. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung is, indeed, as great as the sun.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of humankind just as the sun is eternal.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Prominent figures of political parties and organizations of many countries paid profound reverence to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, the secretary of the Central Committee of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea who is member of its Political Bureau and members of the leadership of political parties concerned and the secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee visited the DPRK embassies in their countries. They placed floral baskets before the full-length pictures of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together there and made bows to them. 
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the general secretary of the People's Vanguard of Costa Rica, the chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, the president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, the director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and other high-ranking officials from political and public circles issued statements in high praises of the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il in party building. 
					
					 Such events as meetings, seminars, lectures and film shows took place in at least 60 countries and regions including China, Russia, Cuba, Pakistan, Iran, Libya, Nigeria, Peru, Brazil, Switzerland, the Czech Republic and France more than 300 times in a little more than one month in celebration of the anniversary. 
					
					 Personages of political parties, governments, organizations and regional and international organizations participated in those events, at which they expressed their boundless praises and reverence for Kim Jong Il who set a shining example in building the Juche-oriented party.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- One day in mid-April Juche 29 (1940), the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) led by President Kim Il Sung had a rest during a march.
					 When the unit was taking breakfast, Japanese imperialists attacked the unit suddenly, threatening the security of the KPRA command.
					
					 At the critical moment, anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk began firing at the enemy, calling on other soldiers to defend the command at the cost of their lives.
					
					 Responding to her call, they fired a volley at the enemy in the death-defying spirit.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, with a group of soldiers, volunteered to lure the enemy away from the command, removing footprints of the unit members who already left.
					
					 The members of the group were very tired for fierce battle and the reinforced enemy persistently followed them. The group was in danger.
					
					 But Kim Jong Suk inspired the fellow soldiers to fight with all their might to defend the command.
					
					 Encouraged by her spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the soldiers bravely fought against the enemy with an indomitable will to safeguard the security of the command.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente venezolano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente venezolano
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 5 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Bolivariana de Venezuela, Hugo Chavez Frias, con motivo del Dia de Independencia de este pais sudamericano.
					  El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, que mantienen la posicion antiimperialista e independiente, se ampliaran y se desarrollaran en varias ramas y desea de todo corazon al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en los trabajos para construir una sociedad en que sea materializado el ideal de la revolucion bolivariana.

articles.title: ATCC rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en tema de DDHH
articles.content:
ATCC rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en tema de DDHH
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el portavoz del Departamento de Estado norteamericano dijo que el "problema de DDHH" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es una prioridad de su pais e influenciara mucho en el acercamiento entre los dos paises.
					  En una palabra, su dicho significa que si la RPDC acepta la demanda de EE.UU. sobre el "problema de DDHH", sera posible el mejoramiento de las relaciones bilaterales. 
					
					  Esto es otro desafio e insulto a la soberania y la dignidad de la RPDC y parte del necio intento de llevar al exito la "ofensiva de DDHH" contra ella seduciendola con el mejoramiento de las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					  Como muestra la historia, en la politica exterior de EE.UU. el tema de DDHH funciona como aparato para la intervencion y presion contra otros paises. 
					
					  El hecho de que EE.UU. describio como su prioridad el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC no es otro sino la revelacion de su intento agresivo de intensificar al maximo la intervencion en los asuntos internos y la presion contra ella.
					
					  La RPDC no puede perdonar ni en lo minimo el intento de EE.UU. de derrumbar su sagrado regimen socialista tomando por pretexto el "problema de DDHH".
					
					  A decir la verdad, EE.UU. es el Estado criminal con el peor problema de derechos humanos que ha venido violando de manera mas barbara y sistematica los derechos humanos del pueblo coreano, razon por la cual no tiene la cara para hablar de la RPDC en ese tema.
					
					  En la RPDC no hay el "problema de DDHH" de que habla tanto EE.UU.
					
					  Este imperio, que considera de signo a siglo el digno sistema socialista de la RPDC como espina atravesada en la garganta, ha venido violando flagrantemente el derecho a la vida y la existencia del pueblo coreano mediante la brutal intervencion armada, genocidio, persistente y atroz sancion y bloqueo.
					
					  Si EE.UU. esta interesado de veras en los derechos humanos, debera abandonar de inmediato su agresiva politica sobre Corea y mejorar primero sus peores registros de DDHH en este mundo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por la gran unidad nacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por la gran unidad nacional
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ATCC) -- Debido a la politica hostil de Estados Unidos a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y a la brutal campana conflictiva con esta de los titeres surcoreanos que persiguen al imperio, se han roto por completo las relaciones entre ambas partes de Corea y crece cada vez mas el peligro de la guerra. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Para superar esta situacion tan grave, toda la nacion coreana debe unirse compactamente bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Nadie tiene derecho a infringir la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, ya que la violacion de estos documentos significa el crimen antinacional contra los acuerdos Norte-Sur y la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					Ahora la banda de Lee Myung Bak lleva las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase de confrontacion total y guerra que se habia visto en los anteriores "regimenes" de la dictadura militar. 
					
					Pretende intensificar la sancion y la presion anti-RPDC en la palestra internacional llevando a la ONU el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", complot inventado por si misma.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, con motivo del 25 de junio, dia de estallido de la pasada guerra coreana, orquesta grandes payasadas anti-RPDC inculcando la hostilidad a los connacionales.
					
					Sin frustrar las imprudentes maniobras conflictivas de la banda traidora surcoreana, no se puede defender las historicas declaraciones acordadas entre el Norte y el Sur ni los exitos valiosos de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio ni esperar el avance del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Aunque haya muchas dificultades en el camino de la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de junio, no sera doblegada jamas la voluntad de la nacion coreana de reunificar el pais de manera independiente.
					
					El triunfo final sera sin falta de la nacion coreana que avanza con gran fe con las fuerzas unidas. 
					
					Todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben levantarse unanimemente en la justa lucha patriotica por rechazar los desafios de las fuerzas internas y externas opositoras a la reintegracion territorial del pais y por lograr la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun justifica el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun justifica el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear
Pyongyang, 5 de julio (ATCC) -- Segun los documentos estatales de Estados Unidos recien descifrados, este pais habia planeado el ataque nuclear contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea durante el incidente del avion espia de gran tamano "EC-121" ocurrido en 1969.
					  Esto demuestra que los imperialistas norteamericanos han venido renovando y desarrollando constantemente el plan de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 5 y continua:
					
					  Hasta la fecha, los imperialistas yanquis maniobraron con fanatismo para poner en practica sus planes de operacion por desatar la nueva guerra coreana.
					
					  Los hechos historicos y la realidad actual comprueban cuan justa fue la decision de la RPDC de responder a las armas nucleares con las mismas.
					
					  La RPDC llego a adquirir el disuasivo nuclear frente a la creciente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. ejerciendo su legitimo derecho a la autodefensa para salvaguardar su soberania y sistema socialista al estilo coreano. Lo demanda tambien la situacion de hoy en que se concreta en realidad en la Peninsula Coreana el riesgo de guerra nuclear proveniente de EE.UU.
					
					  Las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas endurecen ahora mas que nunca su campana para aplastar con las armas nucleares a la RPDC bajo el pretexto del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan".
					
					Puesto que la RPDC corre el riesgo de ser atacada por armas nucleares norteamericanas, ella presta especial atencion al mantenimiento y al fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear.
					
					  La situacion grave creada en la Peninsula Coreana urge a la RPDC consolidar su disuasivo nuclear con el nuevo metodo avanzado.
